languages.text: "Будьте уверены, моя текущая служба на корабле важна, и я исполняю ее со всем рвением".

traits.locale_text: "Будьте уверены, моя текущая служба на корабле важна, и я исполняю ее со всем рвением".

languages.text: "Rest assured, my present duties on this ship matter, and I am fully dedicated to performing them well."
languages.original_text: "Будьте уверены, моя текущая служба на корабле важна, и я исполняю ее со всем рвением".

traits.locale_text: "Rest assured, my present duties on this ship matter, and I am fully dedicated to performing them well."
"Rest assured, my present duties on this ship matter, and I am fully dedicated to performing them well."

"Rest assured, my present duties on this ship matter, and I am fully dedicated to performing them well."

languages.text: 「安心してくれ。今この船で担っている任務は重要なものであり、俺は全力でその遂行に努めている」
languages.original_text: "Rest assured, my present duties on this ship matter, and I am fully dedicated to performing them well."

traits.locale_text: 「安心してくれ。今この船で担っている任務は重要なものであり、俺は全力でその遂行に努めている」

languages.text: "Seid versichert, dass meine gegenwärtigen Pflichten auf diesem Schiff von Bedeutung sind und ich sie mit vollem Einsatz erfülle."
languages.original_text: "Rest assured, my present duties on this ship matter, and I am fully dedicated to performing them well."

traits.locale_text: "Seid versichert, dass meine gegenwärtigen Pflichten auf diesem Schiff von Bedeutung sind und ich sie mit vollem Einsatz erfülle."

languages.text: « Laissez-moi vous assurer que j'accorde toujours la même importance à mes tâches à bord de ce vaisseau, quelles qu'elles soient, et que je les exécuterai du mieux possible. »
languages.original_text: "Rest assured, my present duties on this ship matter, and I am fully dedicated to performing them well."

traits.locale_text: « Laissez-moi vous assurer que j'accorde toujours la même importance à mes tâches à bord de ce vaisseau, quelles qu'elles soient, et que je les exécuterai du mieux possible. »

languages.text: «Pierda cuidado, mis obligaciones en esta nave son importantes y estoy plenamente consagrado a desempeñarlas como es debido».
languages.original_text: "Rest assured, my present duties on this ship matter, and I am fully dedicated to performing them well."

traits.locale_text: «Pierda cuidado, mis obligaciones en esta nave son importantes y estoy plenamente consagrado a desempeñarlas como es debido».

languages.text: “请放心，我目前正在这艘船上履行重要职责，我会全力以赴完成我的使命。”
languages.original_text: "Rest assured, my present duties on this ship matter, and I am fully dedicated to performing them well."

traits.locale_text: “请放心，我目前正在这艘船上履行重要职责，我会全力以赴完成我的使命。”

languages.text: "Gemideki görevlerimden başka önceliğim yok, kendimi vazifeme adadığımdan şüphen olmasın."
languages.original_text: "Rest assured, my present duties on this ship matter, and I am fully dedicated to performing them well."

traits.locale_text: "Gemideki görevlerimden başka önceliğim yok, kendimi vazifeme adadığımdan şüphen olmasın."

languages.original_text: "Rest assured, my present duties on this ship matter, and I am fully dedicated to performing them well."
